entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
